title: TSP ack MQTT message
description: For real-time information of a vehicles

eventTimestamp.description: The eventTimestamp of the vm-message that triggered this message. Example: 2019-10-15T09:06:10.285218Z

publishedTimestamp.description: Timestamp close to when the TSP-message was generated. ISO 8601 UTC. Example: 2019-10-15T09:06:10.285218Z

traceId.description: trace-id of this message. UUID. example: 40634dfc-b8bc-44b5-9353-161ac0b0e80b

vehicleRef.description: Reference to the vehicle. 17-character VIN or 6 character number. Example: XYZ0123X0X0123456 or 123456

signalRef.description: Reference to the signal that was triggered

signalPosition.description: Coordinates of the signal that was triggered, as defined by GeoJson type Point: [longitude, latitude]
